ch.akuhn.matrix

Class SymmetricMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.akuhn.matrix.Matrix
      • ch.akuhn.matrix.DenseMatrix
        • ch.akuhn.matrix.SymmetricMatrix

  • public class SymmetricMatrix
extends DenseMatrix
    Matrix where aij = aji for all elements.

    Author:
    Adrian Kuhn
